heading: HR00589
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES UNDER THE SEVENTEENTH CONGRESS OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ESTABLISH A SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON THE WELFARE OF PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES (PWDs), THROUGH AN APPROPRIATE AMENDMENT OF THE RULES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
